explains: adj. （情绪突然）颓丧的，抑郁的；下沉的
v. 使下沉，下沉；下去，下降；减少（sink 的现在分词）
wordGroup: sinking ship 正在下沉的船
die sinking 刻模；开模；制阴模；加工模腔

sentences.en: She watched him go with a sinking heart.
sentences.cn: 她心情沉重地看着他走了。

sentences.en: Every type of boat was pressed into service to rescue passengers from the sinking ferry.
sentences.cn: 为了营救下沉渡轮上的旅客，各类船只都被临时征用了。

sentences.en: The sun was sinking in the west.
